bill.title: Advisory panel on special education; clarify definition of parent and revise composition of.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 37-23-145, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Clarify The Definition Of A Parent Who Is A Member Of The Advisory Panel On Special Education; To Provide Majority Of Parents Shall Not Be Employed By A State Or Public Agency; To Revise The Composition Of The Advisory Panel To Include New Members And Terms Of Appointment For All Members; To Develop An Advisory Panel Membership Application; To Provide For The Development Of An Advisory Panel Membership Application, To Require The Application To Be Made Available On The State Department Of Education's Website; To Require That The Advisory Panel On Special Education Publish The Approved Minutes On The Department's Website; And For Related Purposes.
